mapper.insert: insert into tbl_bloodtest( BLD_SEQ, BLD_NAME, BLD_NORMALMIN, BLD_NORMALMAX, BLD_OVERNORMAL, BLD_BELOWNORMAL ) values ( seq_bloodtest.nextval, #{bld_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bld_normalmin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bld_normalmax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bld_overnormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bld_belownormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tbl_bloodtest set BLD_NAME =#{bld_name}, BLD_NORMALMIN=#{bld_normalmin}, BLD_NORMALMAX =#{bld_normalmax}, BLD_OVERNORMAL =#{bld_overnormal}, BLD_BELOWNORMAL =#{bld_belownormal} where BLD_SEQ=#{bld_seq}
